ygData.subject: Re: Tinker Bag
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes this info on the bag is correct.  While I have not acquired even close to the 6k plat required to buy the bag myself.  A few of my guild Brothers and
ygData.messageBody:
>
> >I would pay 6000pp for the bag if it does indeed reduce weight to zero. But
> in
> >your haste to critique my post you failed to read it. I want to know how
> this
> >person does indeed know that the bag reduces weight to zero and that it
> isn't just
> >a useless item. Which is what I asked the first time.


Yes this info on the bag is correct. While I have not acquired even close to
the 6k plat required to buy the bag myself. A few of my guild Brothers and
Sisters have managed to make enough plat to buy a bag or 2 in one case (traded
for the second). The tinker bag does reduce weight of all items contained
there in to zero. Its not useless just darn expensive.
Its also not a lore or no drop. You can carry as many of the Tinker Bags as
you have room for.

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
